title: 3 DC's at baron pit
body: In my most recent game as jungle Rengar we had a very close game and were practically tied on gold lead the entire game, then both teams had an opportunity to make or break the game in which my opposing team tried to rush baron. As my team and I closed in to baron, me ult-jumping on it with around 1000 HP, 3 of us had a brief, yet serious disconnect issue in which we couldn't move. This lost us the game and I know that it can't be blamed on my internet or anyone else's because it was three separate people. Things like this can really ruin the competitiveness of a game and make you just want to stop playing. I don't feel like my team deserved the loss since we had been rotating together on towers and dragons properly. I wish I could ask for at least my LP to be returned although 25 LP in Bronze 1 really isn't a big deal. I love you Riot and I hope my voice will be heard.

replies.body:
Your voice has **definitely** been heard. It really sucks when you're fighting tooth and nail for a win only to have something happen to take that moment from you. In these situations, it's hard to judge what exactly happened. When multiple players disconnect from a match, it could be caused by a local/region ISP issue, a continental backbone issue, or a hiccup in the server. 

Events like this are extremely rare, but I can definitely see how they can negatively impact competitive spirit. Unfortunately, LP cannot be modified after the match has been recorded by the server. I feel that your positive attitude that this is only a minor setback is the exact spirit that will carry you through your promo series into Silver! :)

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

Let me know if you have any questions.
